short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wolf Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Wolf background. Wolf wallpaper background theme for animal fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Enjoy a fresh Wolf wallpaper every time you open a new tab with the Shuffle Wolf feature.
2. Customize your Wolf background by randomizing it or marking it as a favorite in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Utilize the integrated Google search bar for efficient searches.
4. Swiftly access your email and social media accounts for seamless connectivity.
5. Stay updated with the automatic display of the current date and time.
6. Utilize the New Note feature to jot down and organize your tasks.
7. Quickly reach your most visited websites for enhanced browsing convenience.
8. Access your bookmarks effortlessly with a simple click.
9. Personalize your browsing experience by adding websites to the Shortcut panel for quick access.
10. Instantly access Google apps for enhanced productivity.
11. Explore a variety of themes with Quick access to More Themes.
12. Share content seamlessly on social media platforms with the Easy Sharing feature.
13. Download wallpapers with a single click through Quick access to Download wallpaper.
14. Dive into entertainment with Quick access to play games.
15. Experience the charm of fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks in your Wolf new tab.
